channel.title: Fixing customs!
channel.description:
Do you know when You wield a customs like a Bronze santa hat.. and it goes in your hand.. How can i get it to go in the head spot instead?
And also how do i add wildrness to a place!?

item.title: Fixing customs!
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

[quote=“runescapemod, post:1, topic:323358”]Do you know when You wield a customs like a Bronze santa hat… and it goes in your hand… How can i get it to go in the head spot instead?

And also how do i add wildrness to a place!?[/quote]

If you want it to go to your head spot go into your Item.Java in your server folder
and look for “Helm” Or “Fullhelm” Along with the codes entered there enter the bronze santa hat’s
code next to them.

Read full topic
